t:
that I can finally read in peace.


I didn't realize that the corpse of my husband was reading over my shoulder until it started to react to what I was reading.
c:
Example of imperfections within the AI. Horror nonetheless, but doesn't make sense, seems forced.

#humanAIcollaboration: This story was completed by a computer.
